entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
